item.description:
The Boston Pops will be holding their rehearsal for the big July 4 concert on Saturday, July 3.
This is an ideal opportunity to enjoy the music in a less crowded environment. The concert is scheduled to begin at 8:30pm, seating will begin at 4:00pm.


I have changed the meeting time to 6:00pm. My cell is 781-462-5817

I am changing the meeting place based on a suggestion I received. We will meet at the just outside Savenor's Market located at 160 Charles St.

http://www.savenorsma...

It will be easier to find one another there as opposed to dealing with the crowd at the Esplanade.

so here's the final word:

We will meet at 6:00pm on Saturday July 3 at Savenor's Market located at 160 Charles Street in Boston. It is close to the charles Street Red Line stop. From there we can walk over to the Esplanade.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting near the snack stand.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Boston Pops July 4 Rehearsal at the Hatch Memorial Shell
